Name: Low-maintenance options
Notes: As a potential customer, I want to find out which plants are easiest to care for so that I can purchase low-maintenance options.

Name: Ability to sort plants by "beginner," "intermediate," and "advanced"
Ability to search for plants with similar care needs
Plant care tips
Notes: As a plant owner, I want to access care instructions easily so that I can keep my plant alive longer.

Name: Receive plant care leaflets with each order
Option to sign up for monthly emails with seasonal care tips
Plant care tools
Notes: As a plant owner, I want to have the right tools to care for my plant so that I can keep it healthy and beautiful.

Name: Can purchase plant care starter kits
Option to buy partial kits or single tools
Watering reminders
Notes: As a plant owner, I want to be reminded when to water my plants so that I don't under- or over-water them.

Name: Expert help and advice
Notes: As a plant owner, I want to get expert help and advice quickly so that I know what to do if my plant gets sick.

Name: Return policy
Notes: As a customer, I want a hassle-free way to return my order so that I can be sure I have the right plant for me.
